step_feedback.feedback: Good job maintaining a straight arm overhead in both repetitions.  Ensure you fully extend your arm to maximize the pump.
You successfully stretched your arm overhead.  Focus on fully opening your palm and fingers to enhance lymph flow.
While you opened your hand, ensure a wider opening and a more complete relaxation during exhalation.  Visualize the fluid moving with each exhale.
In the second repetition, the wrist movement needs more controlled tightening and relaxation.  Remember to coordinate your fist-making with inhalation and hand opening with exhalation.

exercise_summary: The patient demonstrated good posture and arm extension during the overhead pumping exercise.  However, there's room for improvement in fully opening the hand and coordinating breathing with the fist-making and hand-opening actions.  Focusing on complete relaxation during exhalation and visualizing lymph flow will enhance the exercise's effectiveness.
